title: Lifecycle Fields
description: A set of meta-data fields that describe lifecycle events related to AJO entities.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: The lifecycle status of the journey step (e.g., draft, live, completed).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Status Code
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: A machine-readable code representing the lifecycle status.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Process Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: The type of process being executed (e.g., publishing, stopping, delivering).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Process Status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Status of the process (e.g., processing, processed, failed, completed).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Source ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Identifier for the AJO entity (e.g., journey ID, campaign ID).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Source Type
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Type of the AJO entity (e.g., campaign, journey).

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Source Name
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Human-readable name of the AJO entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Is Recurrent
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Indicates if this lifecycle event is part of a recurring AJO entity.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Batch Instance ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Unique identifier for the batch instance.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.title: Recurrence Index
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/lifecycl.description: Index value representing the recurrence index of a recurring AJO entity.
